identity.mission: Create a trading environment that feels like a tactical command center. Speed, clarity, and edge are paramount.

visual_enhancers.noise: opacity-20 mix-blend-overlay pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-[url('/noise.png')]

buttons.primary: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-500 text-white font-bold uppercase tracking-wider text-xs px-6 py-3 rounded-none border border-blue-400/20 shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(37,99,235,0.3)] transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-zinc-900 hover:bg-zinc-800 text-zinc-300 border border-zinc-700 font-medium uppercase tracking-wide text-xs px-6 py-3 rounded-none transition-all
buttons.outline: bg-transparent border border-zinc-700 hover:border-zinc-500 text-zinc-300 hover:text-white uppercase tracking-wide text-xs px-6 py-3 transition-all

cards.base: bg-zinc-900/50 border border-zinc-800/60 p-6 backdrop-blur-sm relative overflow-hidden group
cards.header: flex items-center justify-between mb-4 border-b border-zinc-800/50 pb-2

inputs.base: bg-zinc-950 border-zinc-800 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500 rounded-none h-10 px-3 text-sm placeholder:text-zinc-600 transition-all

charts_and_data.description: High contrast stock chart on dark background, useful for hero section or feature showcase.
Abstract blue digital network, good for AI/Technology background.

traders_and_lifestyle.description: Trader focused on monitors, suitable for 'Who is this for' section.
Trader celebrating success, good for testimonials or success stories.

abstract_tech.description: Dark blue wavy pattern, suitable for footer or section dividers.

dashboard.layout: Use Bento Grid Mode B (High Density). No wasted space.
dashboard.charts: Use Recharts with custom tooltips. Axis lines should be subtle (zinc-800). Gradient fills for area charts.
dashboard.widgets: Cards with sharp corners. Header uppercase mono font. Value prominent (text-3xl+).

journal.layout: Split view: List on left, Detail/Screenshot on right.
journal.typography: Use Serif for personal notes to distinguish from market data.

ai_features.visuals: Use 'Tracing Beam' effect on AI insight cards. Subtle pulsing glow for active analysis.
ai_features.icons: Use Phosphor Icons (Duotone) for AI actions.

calendar.layout: List view with 'Impact' tags (High/Medium/Low) colored Red/Orange/Yellow.

universal_guidelines: ALL TEXT MUST BE IN FRENCH (fr-FR).
Dark Mode ONLY. Do not implement a light mode toggle unless explicitly asked later.
Use 'lucide-react' for general icons, 'phosphor-icons' for feature highlights.
Ensure 3:1 contrast ratio for all text.
No rounded buttons. Sharp edges suggest precision.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-performance trading tool. The user expects a 'Bloomberg Terminal' meeting 'Cyberpunk' aesthetic. Do not make it look like a generic SaaS. Use the provided colors and typography strictly. Ensure all user-facing text is in French.
